comment.body: @AdamWr @Alex-302 If we add `:not([style^="width: 1px; height: 1px; position: absolute;"])` to `##.ad-unit:not(.textads)` and corresponding exceptions, not only this anti-adb but also zdn-adblock-overlay will be defused: https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/53c01bfec182a7281a5f3ffcfbd30091e29cc527 I added `/wp-content/plugins/zdn-adblock-detector/*` but the site owner can implement this differently like https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/27426, https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/199450

Не повторяется.
Попробуйте очистить данные браузера, обновить фильтры (подождите около одной минуты), затем откройте сайт.
Если это не поможет, вам следует повторно включить блокировщики контента (веб расширения) в настройках Safari (подождите примерно столько же времени, сколько и при обновлении фильтров).

issue.title: tracking from digidip.net on dealabs.com

labels.name: T: Analytics
labels.description: Collecting analytics and tracking users

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some sites (such as dealabs.com, to quote one I know) track by passing each clicks through advertising agencies.
With the new version of the $urltransform tool, you can finally “clean up” the links.

Here are a few examples:

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lycamobile.fr%2Ffr%2Fbundle%2Fforfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb%2F&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1714412352

to gives https://www.lycamobile.fr/fr/bundle/forfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb/

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cdiscount.com%2Finformatique%2Fssd%2Fssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m%2Ff-10703-sam8806095575650.html&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Deffiliation.com&ref=ppr-fr-1714418097

to give https://www.cdiscount.com/informatique/ssd/ssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m/f-10703-sam8806095575650.html

### Proposed solution

```
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3A/:/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%2F/\//
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3F/?/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3D/=/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net.*url=([^&]*).*/\$1/
```

The first 4 rules are only for decoding special characters, as the $urltransform tool unfortunately can't do this ([yet](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1915)). When it does, these rules could be removed.

KR,





### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: nana-press.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/194856

issue.title: nana-press.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

comment.body: Thanks

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard/uBO - Cookie Notices uBlock origin in Firefox 136.0

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.theguardian.com/uk

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

EasyPrivacy, Peter Lowe's Blocklist

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Description

Since Firefox update to 136.0 on mac today EasyList/uBO - Cookie Notices & AdGuard/uBO & Cookie Notices filter lists in uBlock Origin stop The Guardian web pages from scrolling - when switched off resets cookie acceptance and once accepted site works normally but not when either of these filters is switched back on
(I am a signed in Guardian subscriber)
Other extensions used

AddToAny: Share Anywhere; Auto-Sort Bookmarks; Bitly | Short links and QR Codes; Dictionary Plus; LastPass; OneNote Web Clipper; Open in Safari; Open in Spotify desktop client; Search by Youtube-Right Click Menu; Search with ChatGPT thread!; Take Webpage Screenshots Entirely - FireShot; VT4Browsers; (I don't care about cookies diasbled for The Guardian)
Filters on

• Ads 1/3
© Easylist g • 69,992 used out of 7
• Privacy 1/4
W EasyPrivacy • 53,353 used ou
• Malware domains 1/2
Online Malicious URL Blocklist O • Multi-purpose 1/2
Peter Lowe's Ad and tracking server

comment.body:
I'm really sorry for the inconvenience but it was another extension that didn't work well when AdGuard was enabled. I removed it and the problem was solved.

It was the extension [Color by Fardos](https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/color-by-fardos-color-pic/acmpamifnancklbfjleoeglnopncibhn)

issue.title: tracking from digidip.net on dealabs.com

labels.name: T: Analytics
labels.description: Collecting analytics and tracking users

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Some sites (such as dealabs.com, to quote one I know) track by passing each clicks through advertising agencies.
With the new version of the $urltransform tool, you can finally “clean up” the links.

Here are a few examples:

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lycamobile.fr%2Ffr%2Fbundle%2Fforfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb%2F&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2F&ref=ppr-fr-1714412352

to gives https://www.lycamobile.fr/fr/bundle/forfait-lyca-s-plus-200gb/

https://dealabs.digidip.net/visit?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cdiscount.com%2Finformatique%2Fssd%2Fssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m%2Ff-10703-sam8806095575650.html&ppref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dealabs.com%2Fsearch%3Fq%3Deffiliation.com&ref=ppr-fr-1714418097

to give https://www.cdiscount.com/informatique/ssd/ssd-interne-samsung-990-evo-plus-2-to-nvme-m/f-10703-sam8806095575650.html

### Proposed solution

```
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3A/:/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%2F/\//
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3F/?/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/%3D/=/
/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net\/visit\?url=/$urltransform=/^https?:\/\/(?:[a-z0-9-]+\.)*?dealabs\.digidip\.net.*url=([^&]*).*/\$1/
```

The first 4 rules are only for decoding special characters, as the $urltransform tool unfortunately can't do this ([yet](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/CoreLibs/issues/1915)). When it does, these rules could be removed.

KR,





### Additional information

_No response_

labels.name: A: Problematic

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.title: Tracker on Huawei phone

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.9 nightly2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://consumer.huawei.com/content/dam/huawei-cbg-site/cn/mkt/mobileservices/browser/exe/HuaweiBrowser-12.1.4.300-signed.exe

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是华为浏览器电脑版，不过应该差不多。如果可以的话，还是使用手机版的华为浏览器更好。但是为了方便，我提供电脑版的，但结果应该也是一样的
browsercfg-drcn.cloud.dbankcloud.cn是华为设备中用来上传用户访问网址的，会将用户访问的网址上传到华为的服务器中，建议禁止，这侵犯了隐私。

[Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/49182661-b711-41c7-9be4-06d232583cc0)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Tracker on Huawei phone

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.9 nightly2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

the problem is with app, not a site

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://consumer.huawei.com/content/dam/huawei-cbg-site/cn/mkt/mobileservices/browser/exe/HuaweiBrowser-12.1.4.300-signed.exe

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

上面的下载链接是华为浏览器电脑版，不过应该差不多。如果可以的话，还是使用手机版的华为浏览器更好。但是为了方便，我提供电脑版的，但结果应该也是一样的
browsercfg-drcn.cloud.dbankcloud.cn是华为设备中用来上传用户访问网址的，会将用户访问的网址上传到华为的服务器中，建议禁止，这侵犯了隐私。

[Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/49182661-b711-41c7-9be4-06d232583cc0)

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

ta.pinduoduo.com
th.pinduoduo.com
下面三条规则建议添加到Adguard防跟踪过滤器，你们再看一下图，图中的url是软件为了绕过规则，所以使用IP，我就用这三条规则拦截，目前软件没有异常。url内容中可以看出会上传版本号等等信息，这侵犯隐私，我觉得应该禁止。为了避免以后IP更改导致规则失效，规则应该不包含IP。
||*d4?appid*type*
||*/d?id=*type*
||*/d?dn=*&id*&type=*

comment.body:
If I enable below filters and leave Annoyances (on the top) also enabled, it wont play the video 

AdGuard Cookie Notices filter
AdGuard Popups filter
AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter
AdGuard Other Annoyances filter
AdGuard Widgets filter


However, if I disable Annoyances then it plays.

I think it is the same. With extension the rules help, but with AdGuard for Windows - not.
Maybe race condition, not sure. Please add also the domain to `$$script:contains(html-load.com)`.
